revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aruba Networks |model=RAP-3WN |revision=P-US |upc= |ean= |asin=B00AT4F26E |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/06/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=Q9DRAP3WN |ic_id=4675A-RAP3WN |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QJ-BCF7 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0B:86 |oui_eth=00:0B:86 }} [http://www.infinigate.de/fileadmin/user_upload/Products/Aruba/Products/Access_Points/DS_RAP3.pdf Aruba RAP-3 Remote Access Point] "P/N: 142000000434A REV: 0B" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
"NI2077041001F 1 N1" is printed on a label stuck to the board in the FCC photos. There is a label on the bottom of the board in the FCC photos with a S/N, MAC, and Wireless MAC. :S/N: BF000048B :MAC: 001A1E082409 :WIRELESS MAC: D8C7C8C503CD 00:1A:1E and D8:C7:C8 are '''Aruba Networks''' OUIs.
